alert.note: Alert for Central Sacramento Valley including Glenn, Colusa, Yuba, Northern Sutter, Butte County Below 1000 Ft; Eastern Mendocino NF; Northern Sacramento Valley to Southern Tehama County Line Below 1000 Ft; Southeast Edge Shasta, Trinity NF and Western Portions of Tehama, Glenn RU; Southern Sacramento Valley In Yolo, Sacramento, Far Western Placer, Southern Sutter and Solano County Below 1000 Ft - Excludes the Delta (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 30 at 1:59PM PDT until August 30 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE ZONES 215, 216, 217, 263, AND 279... * Winds...Northerly winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts 30 to 35 mph. * Humidity...Overnight humidity recoveries of 30 to 45 percent. Minimum humidity of 5 to 17 percent this afternoon. * Highest Threat...West side of the Sacramento Valley, mainly along and west of Interstate 5. * Impacts...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity can cause fire to rapidly grow in size and intensity. Outdoor burning is not recommended. *
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
